errors.error_description: References requirements.txt file for installation but this file does not exist in the repository
Installation instructions suggest installing package in development mode before installing dependencies, but dependencies should typically be installed first or automatically handled
correction_candidates: Change order to install dependencies first: `pip install -r requirements.txt` then `pip install -e .`
Use single command: `pip install -e .` (which handles dependencies automatically)
Add setup step: `python setup.py develop` before `pip install -e .`
errors.golden_answer: Use single command: `pip install -e .` (which handles dependencies automatically)
